gamerule.keepRecoveryCompass.description: Controls if they player should keep their recovery compass upon death
gamerule.showDeathCoordinates.descriptio: Controls whether or not to show Death Coordinates to the player upon dying
gamerule.allowCoffinRobbing.description: Controls if other players are allowed to look into other player's coffins (Death only)
gamerule.deathRequiresCoffin.description: Controls if a coffin should spawn only if the player has one on them (On Death)
